name: lets-try-this-again-special-edition-bush-mccain-challenge
title: Let’s Try This Again: “Special Edition” Bush-McCain Challenge
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
After making the jaunt downtown yesterday to watch the sure-to-be-entertaining Bush-McCain Challenge sponsored by MoveOn.org, our feelings were a little hurt when we got there and realized they’d stood us up. No one seems to know what happened, but after raising some Cain when we got home, it seems they’ve magically rescheduled the event for Sunday at 2pm. This time instead of an abandoned pub, they’ve chosen “the sidewalk in front of Centennial Park,” which doesn’t give us much in the way of details, but we’re guessing they mean the one along West End. We’ll probably check it out.

Public Domain photo courtesy of pingnews.
